name: You're under harvest
description:
Description

Small rythm game made with Pico-8

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 52, the theme was "Harvest"

All assets were created during the event

Controls

  • Arrow keys to collect corresponding items
  •  Z / C / X / V in menus to start the game

Source code

https://github.com/Mastoast/LDJam52
